description: The trail is well maintained, it is gravel most of the way. It is an easy hike and pretty close to the city. Because it is so close to the city, you can hear traffic from the highway the whole hike. So if you?re looking to hear nature and escape the city hassle this may not be the trail for you. The hike was nice though with Lake Charles visible most of the time. There are elevation changes but nothing to drastic, a great trail for biking, running or just hiking.
directions: Take Highway 111 South exit 6A for 318 North toward Waverly/Braemar Drive. Then turn left onto Locks Rd. head to the end of the road and your at the Parks parking lot. N44 42.135 W63 33.213 (Entrace to parking lot)
title: Hike Alongside Lake Charles
